definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though

sentences.english: Not enough cooling power could mean heatstroke or dehydration.
sentences.chinese: 冷卻能力不足會造成中暑脫水。

sentences.english: Think twice about the office watercooler.
sentences.chinese: 在辦公室使用冷卻器請三思。

sentences.english: Actually, the hot feeling of love will cool down after 100 days.
sentences.chinese: 其實，愛情的致熱期會在100天后開始冷卻。

sentences.english: While the oil is cooling mix your methanol and NaOH(lye) to form the methoxide.
sentences.chinese: 當食用油冷卻時，先將甲醇和氫氧化鈉。

sentences.english: The cooling water jackets are arranged on the welding torch from the front part to the back part.
sentences.chinese: 在焊炬上從前部到後部均設有冷卻水套。

sentences.english: Single set of pressing platens with both heating and cooling on the same platens .
sentences.chinese: 單套壓臺上同時帶有加熱和冷卻系統的壓臺配置。

sentences.english: All cfc coolants must be removed from fridges.
sentences.chinese: 必須將所有的氟氯化碳冷卻液從冰箱中去除。
沒有冷卻風扇，靜默工作。

sentences.english: The accident took place at a power plant in Fengcheng where a cooling tower was under construction.
sentences.chinese: 事故發生在江西豐城一處電廠，正在修建一座冷卻塔。

sentences.english: In all tests video card and processor were cooled by liquid nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 在所有測試的顯示卡和處理器被冷卻的液態氮。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to an apparatus and method for cooling air.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及到一儀器和方法的冷卻空氣。

sentences.english: So desert should take heat with cereus.
sentences.chinese: 水加熱則成爲蒸汽，冷卻則成爲冰。

sentences.english: Application of laminar spray cooling system in Plate Mill of Shougang Group Co.
sentences.chinese: 層流冷卻系統在首鋼中厚板廠的應用。

sentences.english: Place the pie on a wire rack and cool to room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 烤好之後將派放在鐵架上冷卻至室溫。

sentences.english: It requires substantially less electrical consumption for deposition and, as a result, less refrigeration for cooling.
sentences.chinese: 電泳本身耗電量少，從而用於冷卻的冷量也少。

sentences.english: The United States provided equipment for a seismic-resistant, spray-pond cooling system.
sentences.chinese: 美國提供了一套抗震噴水冷卻系統。

definition: to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
to become cooler/to lower the temperature/cooling/(of interest, activity etc) to decline
to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
